days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O Saint Margaret, who lived life’s trials with patience and trust and turned the wounds of your disabilities into an opportunity to save your soul and the souls of others, intercede for me that I may be granted the grace to recognise God’s will in every circumstance of my life and the strength to accept it. 
In particular I ask for the following intention (mention your request here…)
May I be granted the grace I am asking for thanks to your intercession and prayer.
O God, who illumined the heart of St Margaret of Castello with Thy Divine light, and welcomed her into Thy fatherly embrace, we beseech Thee, be our light so that we may not be lost in the darkness of the world, and may reach Thee where the light shines eternally, with Christ Jesus our Lord.
O Lord, we beseech Thee to glorify the humble Saint Margaret and grant us all that we ask of Thee for Thy honour and glory and the salvation of our souls. 
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Margaret of Castello, pray for us!
